headline: 4 Utility Stocks to Buy as Consumer Confidence Sinks to 12-Year Low
summary: Utility stocks like AVA, CMS, NI and CNP are a safe bet amid growing concerns of a slowing economy.

headline: Here's Why You Should Add NiSource Stock to Your Portfolio Now
